discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Others are for CLI access

I'd go with B:
 aaa authentication enable default enable ---> This only authentificates for enable access
B. aaa authorization network default group ise ----> This authorizes policy based on successful authentification
C. aaa authentication login console ise ---> Authentification for console port ( has no impact on users
D. aaa authorization exec default ise ----> Authorization for exec ( has no impact on users)

Selected Answer: B
https://community.cisco.com/t5/network-access-control/what-does-mean-aaa-authorization-network-what-does-limit-network/td-p/3083344
so its b?

Selected Answer: B
B is correct, this answer needs to be updated on the website

choices.B: aaa authorization network default group ise

questions.question_text: Which method of attack is used by a hacker to send malicious code through a web application to an unsuspecting user to request that the victim's web browser executes the code?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)

questions.question_text: Which two solutions help combat social engineering and phishing at the endpoint level? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
The two solutions that help combat social engineering and phishing at the endpoint level are:

B. Cisco Duo Security: Cisco Duo Security is a multi-factor authentication solution that provides a second layer of security to the login process, which helps prevent social engineering attacks that steal user credentials.

D. Cisco Umbrella: Cisco Umbrella is a cloud-based security platform that provides DNS and web filtering security services. It can help prevent phishing attacks by blocking access to malicious domains and IP addresses.

Selected Answer: BD
Duo will protect to use stolen credentials
umbrella will protect phising sites

Selected Answer: BD
B and D are correct, please update website

Selected Answer: BD
Cisco ISE, Cisco DNA Center, and Cisco TrustSec are not specifically designed to combat social engineering and phishing at the endpoint level. Cisco ISE is an identity and access management solution, Cisco DNA Center is a network management and automation solution, and Cisco TrustSec is a security policy management solution.

Selected Answer: BD
Must be B & D - TrustSec (E) is for microsegmentation and has nothing to do with phishing

Selected Answer: BD
DUO and Umbrella

Selected Answer: BD
it's B,D

ISE and DUO should be the correct ans as phishing attacks are targeted on user identity, and ISE/DUO are the solutions for securing the authentication part.
